backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining a risk classification function and generating investment recommendations based on conservative, moderate, or aggressive profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented frontend files to feature requirements and test IDs for multiple product features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend React/TypeScript files including pages, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH design tokens, light/dark mode variables, and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file with root mount point and script loading the main React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes and applying global layout with header, footer, and theming.
frontend/src/components/charts/AssetAllo: Recharts pie chart component rendering asset allocation data with legend, tooltips, and a fallback list view.
frontend/src/components/chatbot/ChatbotR: Chatbot results screen displaying classification label, allocation chart, SIP suggestion, model portfolios, and do/don't lists using backend recommendations.
frontend/src/components/chatbot/RiskProf: Multi-step form collecting risk profiling inputs and submitting them to classifyProfile before returning profile and classification.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Renders footer with brand info, navigation links, legal notice, and credits.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive site header with logo and navigation, including a mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading, login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks for profile classification and recommendation generation using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light/dark fintech color palettes and custom utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/finance.ts: Utility for formatting INR currency and suggesting SIP amounts based on income and horizon.
frontend/src/lib/sipCalculator.ts: Implements SIP future value calculation and INR currency formatting.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Renders the About page explaining InvestSmart AI’s mission, audience, and educational focus using cards and icon sections.
frontend/src/pages/Chatbot.tsx: Manages chatbot state for risk profiling, switching between the chat flow and results view.
frontend/src/pages/Disclaimer.tsx: Displays legal and educational disclaimers clarifying that the platform is not financial advice or SEBI‑registered.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Provides the homepage with a hero section, navigation buttons, and introductory explanations of risk profiling and investing concepts.
frontend/src/pages/LearnInvesting.tsx: Shows beginner‑friendly investing lessons with cards and accordions covering basics, risk, and key concepts.
frontend/src/pages/SipCalculator.tsx: Implements a SIP calculator allowing users to input parameters and view projected investment results.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom color tokens, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining the website vision, required features, architectural notes, and image assets for the InvestSmart AI fintech site.
